snippet.title: A Gay Dragon - iPhone - HD Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
A Gay Dragon by Redikod

Play as the adorable dragon Melwin in a stylized 3D-world as you look for true love!

Unlock treasures, furniture and tiles to adorn your Lair and dig rooms and caverns to make yours the best Dragon's Lair!


Strategic 3D puzzler with cute graphics

- Sneak past dangers, pick up treasures and find true love!

A hoard of levels

- Travel the world, visiting various kingdoms in your quest!

Lair Makeover

- Dig out and design your personal Lair and walk through it as Melwin in first-person!

iTunes Store Page:

http://itunes.apple.com/app/a-gay-dragon/id495692332

Homepage:

http://agaydragon.com/
